Generate a block of signal of Gaussian shape

Source: R/tree_simulation_functions.R
gauss_bloc.Rd

Generate a block of signal of Gaussian shape

gauss_bloc(barmu, len)

Arguments

barmu

A numeric value, the strength of the signal
len

An integer value, teh length of the block

Value

A numeric vector of length len, the signal values in the block
